headline: Bloom Energy (BE) Is Up 7.5% After Securing $2.65 Billion AEP Fuel-Cell Offtake Deal – What's Changed
summary: American Electric Power’s subsidiary has exercised its option on a roughly US$2.65 billion, 20-year offtake agreement for Bloom Energy’s solid oxide fuel cells, underscoring Bloom’s expanding role in onsite and distributed power solutions for critical infrastructure, including AI data centers. This contract, alongside improving margins, free cash flow trends, and Bloom’s growing presence in next-generation onsite power, signals a meaningful shift in how investors view its position within the...

headline: Wells Fargo Updates Long-Term Valuation Framework for American Electric Power (AEP)
summary: American Electric Power Company, Inc. (NASDAQ:AEP) is included among the 14 High Yield Dividend Stocks with Sustainable Payouts. On January 20, Wells Fargo raised its price objective on American Electric Power Company, Inc. (NASDAQ:AEP) to $140 from $139 and maintained an Overweight rating. The firm said the change reflects a decision to roll its valuation […]
